comments:
In the Laszlo Perspective, if a Java source editor is opened or if an open Java source editor is selected, then you get an Error dialog. The Error dialog says: "An error has occured. See error log for more details." In the error log I have the following exception over and over again:

A workaround was to close the Script Explorer view.
Cheanged from severity of blocker to major.
I have the same problem and performed all of the Mozilla install procedure exactly as described on the Laszlo website, it did not fix the problem.

(In reply to comment #4)
> I have the same problem and performed all of the Mozilla install procedure
> exactly as described on the Laszlo website, it did not fix the problem.  

I have been unable to reproduce this.

I'm running JDK 1.4.2, Eclipse 3.1.2, WebTools 1.0, Laszlo Tools 0.1.0b  on Win XP Pro and Mac OS 10.4.5.

The original bug report says that an error arises when a Java editor is opened from within the Laszlo Perspective. I've had no trouble opening .java files from the Script Explorer view (Mac OS) or the Navigator view (same view, Windows OS). 

Neither have I had a problem opening .java files from the File->Open File... menu.

Perhaps a user using the latest version of the Laszlo and Eclipse tools can send me the steps specifically known to replicate this bug.

(In reply to comment #5)
Hi, a little more information for you :)

I have just downloaded a pristine copy of the WTP all in one, available at: 
http://download.eclipse.org/webtools/downloads/drops/R-1.0.1-200602171228/
This WTP was released 17th Feb 2006. 
I have also just downloaded the latest IDE for Laszlo (version 0.1.0b) built for JDK 1.5, which was released on February 2nd 2006. 
I have the JDK-1.5.0_06
I'm running under SuSE 10.0 with the latest updates installed (to 15th March). 
I'm not using the integrated Laszlo/Tomcat install, I'm running the Laszlo servlet within my own Tomcat install - and it's working well. 

I unpacked the WTP and installed the Laszlo IDE as per the instructions. I created a Laszlo project according to the instructions and tried to create a Laszlo file. The new file dialog runs fine, but as soon as I click "finish" I get a unhandled exception error. 

Here is the lenghty output :S
